homeAssets.copy:
Furniture </-->
Seedpod Fan
Keep the heat away with these spinning seedpods!
Swirled Toadstool Chairs
Rest your legs and wings sitting in this comfy chair set!
Rain Bed
Rani and her friends love this water-filled bed.
Nutshell Bookcase
The perfect place to store jewelry boxes, books, and other keepsakes.
Maple Mat
To keep a floor clean, one needs a place to wipe their feet!
Lily Pad Mat
The perfect welcome mat for your water-talent friends!
Toadstool Tableset
Tea is best served on a toadstool!
Tenderleaf Table
This table is made from a sturdy leaf from the Never Bimbim tree!
Blossom Bench
This stool is great for sitting down with a great book or in Tink's case, a broken ladle!
Driftwood Bed
Sleeping on this bed may lead to dreams of mermaids and pirate ships!
Lily Nightstand
Perfect for propping a lamp or a bedside book!
Tulip Leaf Table
This leaf was molded and shaped to hold cups and plates!
Sunflower Loveseat
The perfect piece for a friendly chat.
Daisy Bloom Swing
A Fairy's life isn't all flying and working. Swinging is important too!
Leaf Lounger
This special reclining chair is ideal for an afternoon nap.
Daisy Cover Bed
A bed of petals, it's sure to have anyone dreaming of gardens!
Dewdrop Mirror
Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the most talented of them all?
Oak Throw Rug
The durable oak leaf makes for a great place to wipe your feet!
Seashell Shelf
Made from an abandoned shell, this shelf can hold many heavy knickknacks!
Driftwood Mantle
Made from wood washed up on the Northern Shore, this shelf reminds everyone of the beach!
Heart Leaf Stand
It may look flimsy but this leaf is as durable as the mighty oak!
Violet Blossom Swing
Catch the sweet scent in the air as the breeze blows through your hair!
Walnut Bookshelf
The hard outer shell protects delicate leaf journals.
Mushroom Furniture Set
These table and chairs are squishy and fun to sit on!
Toadstool Furniture Set
A table made from toadstools, but just don't try and eat it!
Garden Lounge Chair
When your wings need some rest, take a seat and relax!
Water Lounge Chair
Stretching out on this relaxing chair might just end up in a nap!
Forest Floor Sofa
The color of the lush forest makes this sofa feel like home!
Autumn Eve Sofa
Leaves of every color and shade go into making this sofa as comfortable as possible!
Oak Bark Shelf
It's so sturdy, it could hold a dozen books!
Riverstone Stand
Constructed with smooth stones from the river banks!
Lily Pad Rug
Summer nights are filled with the music of frogs singing on these lily pads!
Sunpetal Loveseat
It's a comfy couch that also produces delicious seeds!
Waterdrop Wall Shelf
Display your most treasured art objects on this sparkling shelf unit.
Eggshell Tea Table
Heat up the kettle and call your friends!
Carved Riverstone Table
A traditional water-talent favorite.
Walnut Bed
Half a walnut is plenty for anyone to snuggle up nice and warm on winter nights!
Leaf Panel Curtains
Adjust the leaves to let in all the light or just a little!
Four-Peg Oak Hanger
A handy place to hang wet leaf scarves, hats, and coats to dry.
Twig Porch Swing
The perfect place to relax and watch the setting sun.
Bubble-Pad Bed
It's like drifting on water - because you are!
Lily Pad Sponge Table
Don't worry if you spill your drink - the table will soak it up!
End Furniture </-->
Lamps </-->
Tulip Floor Lamp
This lamp is wonderful for a quick flip through a journal or diary!
Buttercup Floor Lamp
Not only does it provide illumination, but the buttercup also smells wonderful!
Daisy Table Lamp
The handy leaf pull-cord makes this the perfect bedside accessory.
Petal Candle
The glow from this colorful petal candle is warm and inviting.
Glowing Gourd Lamp
Sometimes a little more light is needed!
Hanging Hibiscus Lantern
This lamp hangs from the ceiling or low branches - wherever light is needed!
Rose of Sharon Lamp
A special lamp with a pull chain to turn the light on and off!
Toadstool Table Lamp
This mushroom can really light a room!
Bellflower Lamp
This lamp allows light to fill a room or just shine directly on the pages of a good book!
Firefly Lantern
The fireflies of Pixie Hollow love to light these lanterns with their glow!
Misty Petal Lamp
Dainty petals are used to make this lamp glow extra bright!
Blooming Orchid Lamp
When you turn this light on, the petals open to allow the light to shine!
Toadstool Lamp
There are plenty of mushrooms in the forest but none of them come with firefly power!
Curly Glow Lamp
A swirl, a curl, and a handy light that adjusts to glow right where you need it!
Leaf Basket Lantern
Perfect to light up a room on a late summer evening.
All-Night Glow Light
Don't like to sleep in the dark? This soft glow will keep you comfortable.
Hanging Heart Lanterns
Will hold a special place in your heart and in your home.
Candelabra
Adds a spark of elegance to any home in the Hollow.
End Lamps </-->
Decoration </-->
Butterfly Bowl
The decorative butterfly accent is made from violet petals!
Pollen Carrier Collection
These jars can hold all manner of dust and pollen, great for mixing up potions or perfumes!
Camillia Pillows
Freshly picked and stuffed with cotton flower fluff.
Posy Pillow
What better place to catch a nap than on the soft petals of a posy?
Crocus Bulb Pitcher
A hollowed-out flower bulb is perfect for pouring fruit nectars for your guests!
Lucky Fortune Flower
This plant is meant to bring good luck and happy days to a home!
Watering Tin
An essential item for any garden-talent!
Lavender Sachet
The scent of lavender can be quite calming.
River Stone Pitcher
Keeps water piping hot for a quick cup of tea.
Tin Thimble
The most common item to wash up on the Never Land shore.
Clay Pot
Grinding pollen or mixing herbs, this pot can be used for all sorts of tasks!
Woven Basket
A trip to the forest or garden to gather goods is easy with this basket!
Gardening Journal
How fast do flowers grow? What kinds of seeds should be planted? Find out and write it down!
Butterfly Sculpture
A tribute to the carefree, flitterific butterfly.
Seed Ladle
Makes transporting seeds to the garden easy as pixie pie!
Spider Silk Curtains
When the light hits these curtains, it casts a shimmering sparkle on the floor.
Never Land Map
Plan an adventure or learn the lay of the land with this map on a tree stand.
Seahorse Wall Decoration
This seahorse fossil is said to come all the way from Starfish Gap in Mermaid Lagoon!
Pebble Finger Harp
Anyone can learn to play this simple yet stunning instrument!
Reed Flute
Reed flutes are a favorite of the Lost Boys, but this one is Fairy-sized.
Forest Bins
Little containers made from acorns and mushrooms - they're the perfect size for Fairies!
Jewel Box
A beautiful box to store away precious stones, jewels, and valuables!
Firefly Fetcher
Firefly tag is a favorite of all light-talents!
Grass Houseplant
If you're like Lily and like to watch grass grow, this is the perfect home decor item for you!
Leaf Blanket
Made from soft leaves, this blanket is said to be very comfortable.
Acorn Kettle
When it's teatime, this kettle will make any blend delicious!
Squirrel Doll
A doll that is much smaller than the tree-jumping friends of the Fairies.
Cerulean Butterfly Glider
This glider sparkles with the colors of the ocean!
Ruby Butterfly Glider
This glider captures the color of a striking sunset!
Lilac Butterfly Glider
This glider is as bright as a ripe boysenberry!
Chatter
Squirrels are always busy gathering food for the winter - this one won't wander far!
Forest Cap Thimble
Lost things can be used in so many ways!
Raindrop Mirror
If it ever breaks, all you have to do it wait for the next rainy day!
Trinket Chest
For all the secret things you find, keep them locked away in this safe box!
Leaf Wrap Kettle
This kettle keeps liquids nice and hot until they're ready to be sipped!
Studded Seahorse Comb
Made to resemble the majestic seahorse, it works best on wet hair!
Bellflower Chandelier
String these bright lights up across the room to illuminate your home!
Squeaks
The perfect decoration for any animal lover!
Butterfly Glider
When it catches a breeze, this decoration twirls like a real butterfly!
Blue-Tipped Potted Plant
The leaves of this lovely plant are also a yummy treat for the bunnies of Pixie Hollow.
Acorn Teapot
Some say tea tastes best when poured from an Acorn.
Wild Walnut Basket
Tink isn't the only one who can turn one thing into another. Just look at this walnut!
Chestnut Basin
This basket is great for carrying everything from water to water lilies!
Feather Pillow
Fast-flying talents gather feathers for this comfortable pillow.
Oyster Shell Mirror
Always look your best by keeping this shimmering mirror in your home.
Purple Posy Plant
Brighten up your home with this lush and leafy plant. Never needs watering.
Mainland-Style Finger Harp
Based on a unique design by Tinker Bell. She found something similar on the mainland.
Autumn Harvest Bag
Big enough for seeds, acorns, AND berries! Also makes a great gift!
Acorn Timer
Never be late for a party again!
Fluffy Fish Pillow
You'll be dreaming of bouncing fish all night with this stylish pillow!
Bubble Stand
This bright bubble brings a little piece of Soapstone Stream to your home!
Firefly Light-Up Basket
Always be ready to help the light-talents with this handy basket.
Firefly Doll
A light-talent favorite!
Tinker's Hammer
So useful that any talent will be glad to have one!
Tinker's Workbench
A sturdy table complete with a clamp for building all sorts of gadgets.
Tinkering Glass
Polished quartz makes this magnifying glass the perfect tool for delicate tinkering work.
Blueprint Scrolls
Special blueprint paper for recording new tinkering designs.
Harvest Cornucopia
A simple cornucopia to store nuts and berries.
Fancy Cornucopia
A beautifully crafted cornucopia for celebrating autumn's harvest.
Berry Wreath
Brighten up your home with this delicious-looking wreath!
Harvest Garland
Surround yourself with the feeling of a full harvest with these beautiful garlands.
Snow Blanket
This blanket is as soft and clean as a field of freshly fallen snow -- but not a bit cold!
Wind Chime
You'll always know when a breeze is blowing with this unique wind chime.
Fairy Tales Collection
No home is complete without these wonderful stories!
Dear Diary Desk
The perfect pixie place for penning a letter or drawing a picture!
Hot Cocoa Mug
What better way to warm up than with a big mug of hot cocoa?
Hot Cocoa Kettle
Hot cocoa warms everyone up on an icy day!
Cookie Jar
The perfect place to keep yummy goodies -- especially cookies!
Big Comfy Chair
Made of super-soft leaves, it's perfect for a snugly nap!
Cozy Fireplace
A cracklin' warm addition to a chilly home!
Sweet Tea Light
This soft light adds a touch of grace to any home. Plus it smells like cinnamon!
Chipmunk Doll
A fuzzy pal who would be happy to share your home!
Tea Time Serving Cart
An essential item for only the most elegant tea parties.
Hanging Flower Light
Brings a beautiful garden glow to any home!
Bear Doll
A furry companion who loves to share a cozy nap!
Shimmering Bell
When the light hits this bell, look out - you'll get dance fever!
Dance Pad
Specially padded to keep your feet dancing all night!
Elegant Vanity
A perfect place for checking a hair-do or striking a pose!
Tea Table
Just set out the plates, bring out the snacks and have a party!
Egg Collector Basket
The preferred basket for egg collecting!
Bean Bag Chair
Why not take a rest and relax on this big, extra-poofy chair!
Popcorn Bowl
Got the munchies? Then this bowl is perfect for you!
Butterfly Teacup
The intricate design like butterfly wings makes these teacups a favorite of the Minister of Summer.
Butterfly Teapot
Meadow Grass tea tastes just a little sweeter when served in a Butterfly Teapot.
Spotted Egg
Collect a whole set and see if your friends can "spot" them in your home!
Striped Egg
Collect a whole set and have an egg hunt right in your own home!
Swirled Egg
Collect a whole set and invite your friends for your own egg hunt!
Tiki Light
Throw a freaky tiki party with a freaky Tiki Light!
Neverwood Chair
You'll be sitting pretty in this relaxing chair made from beautiful Neverwood!
Honey Jar
Make your Home Sweet Home even SWEETER!
Tinker Pot
A handy Tinker's pot. Tink has one in each color!
Juice Pitcher
Just what you need to stir up a yum-licious batch of Neverberry punch!
Juice Glass
Thirsty? Sip some Neverberry punch from one of these darling glasses!
Leaf Boat
Get ready for some puddle paddling fun on Soapstone Stream!
Fairy Light Catcher
Sparkle up your home with this light catcher designed by Iridessa!
Neverwood Trellis
Give your plants a lift with this favorite garden decoration!
Dangling Blossoms Basket
The lovely blossoms will fill your home with the scents of summer all year long!
Fancy Topiary
Plants can learn tricks too -- these bushes know how to grow in poofs!
Harvest Table
Dinner parties are lovely at this Harvest Table.
Leafy Cake Stand
Delicious cakes deserve lovely stands!
Poppy Puff Picnic Basket
Poppy puff rolls are a perfect picnic treat!
Walnut Casserole Dish
Warm food is best when served in this Walnut Casserole Dish.
Sauce Serving Dish
Baking-talents love to simmer sauce in this slim leaf dish.
Tink's Balloon Toy
Dream of adventures far and away when this toy balloon like Tink's hangs in your home.
Drama Poster
A must-have for theater fans.
Double Drums
Musicians can drum up music at home with this great set of almond and hazelnut drums.
Petal Wrap Microphone
Songbirds can perform at home with a thick petal wrap microphone.
Vintage Harp
One of the oldest Fairy instruments, this harp is perfect for making delicate music.
Conductor Stand
Orchestrate at home with this elegant leaf Conductor Stand.
Itty Bitty Bells
This beautiful branch of little bells is a lovely percussion instrument.
Painter's Vase
Bess designed this daisy vase for artists to keep brushes in.
Cake, Cherry, Cherry, Treat
A still life of a Dulcie treat that Bess did many times during her fruit study.
Crouching Bunny
A portrait of an Animal Friend of Fawn's painted often by Bess.
Painterly Buckets
Every artist needs tools, and these buckets are perfect for mixing paint.
Carved Bunny
Often thought of as good luck when placed near a door, crouching carved bunnies are cute too!
Tall Mouse Tale Sculpture
This wood sculpture was inspired by a story-telling mouse friend of Beck's.
Drum Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament deserves a drum roll!
Fairy Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is a teeny dancer!
Feather Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is as light as a hen feather!
Sun Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is bright as a ring!
Flute Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament can also be played!
Frog Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament looks real enough to leap!
Hook Ornament
This cute ribbon looks marvelous in many colors on a decorating tree.
Hummingbird Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is as sweet as a bird call!
Mouse Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is cute as a milk mouse!
Nest Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is great as geese!
Swan Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is elegant!
Turtle Dove Ornament
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is lovey-dovey!
Partridge Treetopper
Inspired by a song heard on the mainland, this ornament is not just for pear trees!
Small Decorating Tree
Inspired by a mainland custom, this tree is for hanging ornaments!
Tall Decorating Tree
Inspired by a mainland custom, this tree is for hanging ornaments!
Prickly Pear Plant
This bristly plant is home to Vidia's favorite flower -- the Prickly Pear Blossom!
Music Stand
Orchestrate at home with this elegant leaf music stand stamped with a paw!
Clover Swing
This cute clover leaf swing is perfect for playful pixies!
Clover Curtain
Drape this long, lovely clover curtain in any room for good luck!
Small Clover Cluster Rug
This small cluster of clovers is perfect for dressing up the floor!
Comfy Clover Chair
This comfy clover chair is perfect for cozying up with a good book!
Large Clover Cluster Rug
This large cluster of clovers is a cozy addition to any home!
Glittery Gem Table
This glittery gem table is inspired by Iridessa's furniture.
Glittery Gem Stool
Iridessa keeps these glittery stools around for extra seating at parties.
Glittery Chandelier
This gorgeous chandelier has reflective gems that light any room!
Glittery Jars
Every room needs more glitter, so decorate with these jars!
Glittery Gem Chair
This glittery gem chair is inspired by a set Iridessa has.
Thimble-made Table
This kitschy table on thimble legs was made by Tinker Bell herself!
Playing Card Lounger
Relax on this chair after a long day of searching for Lost Things!
Thimble-made Chair
This fuzzy chair on a thimble was made by Tinker Bell herself!
Lost Wind-Up Box Base
A wind-up box found by Tink that is perfect for playing ballerina!
Lost and Found Mirror
Using Lost Things, Tink found a way to make a decorative mirror!
Lost and Found Sofa
Using Lost Things, Tink found a way to make a super simple sofa!
Sunny Side Up Egg
This sweet little decorative egg has the beautiful sun!
Nighty Night Egg
This sweet little decorative egg has the beautiful night!
Flower Power Egg
This sweet little decorative egg has sweet flowers!
Butterfly Egg
This sweet little decorative egg has cute butterflies!
Precious Treasure
This pile of precious gold and jewels is fun for playing pirate!
Play Pirate Ship
Ahoy! This little prop ship is fun for pirate plays!
Precious Compass
This lovely mainland crafted compass is true pirate décor!
Leaf Top Tea Table
This table with a leafy cloth top is perfect for tea!
Leaf Top Tea Side Table
This tiny table with a leafy cloth top is perfect for tea!
High Backed Tea Chair
This high backed tea chair is gorgeous in any color!
Hardwood Hutch
This sturdy hardwood hutch is perfect for your best tea cups!
Landscape Stained Glass
Hug a tree, then hang one in your room with this stained glass beauty!
Single Rose Stained Glass
Don't worry, this pretty stained glass rose hanging has no thorns!
Firefly Stained Glass
This pretty stained glass firefly hanging is beautiful!
Fallen Feather Quill
When feathers fall from birds, Fairies love to make useful quills!
Piping Hot Fireplace
This little found pipe makes the most warm and cozy fires!
Stack 'Em High Shelves
These shelves hold more books than you can imagine!
Potted Palm Tree
This massive palm tree is huge, but brings a bit of the cove into your home!
Blooming Bonsai
This blooming bonsai tree is huge, but looks great in any color!
Pepper 'N Rose
This pepper shaker is simple elegance with a Rose!
Box of Buds
This box of rosebuds is beautiful!
Salt 'N Daisies
This salt shaker is sweet with a bunch of Daisies!
Bubble'n'Boil Kettle
When it's teatime, this kettle will make any blend delicious!
Cool and Comfy Bed
The perfect bed for summer days. Keeps Animal Friends comfortable even on the hottest days.
Bottlecap Bed
Real bottlecaps floated in from the mainland, and they're the perfect size for critter beds!
Walnut Safety Bed
When Animal Friends sleep, sometimes they fall out of bed! This bed will keep them safe.
Lazy Daisy Bed
Just the thing for fussy little fireflies at nap time. Soft daisy petals lull them right to sleep!
Twig Nest
Most young hummingbirds like this bed the best. I wonder why?
Wide Wicker Bed
Just the bed for older Animal Friends who want to stretch out their legs after a long playtime!
Lotus Flower Bed
A favorite with baby dragonflies, who like to be reminded of living near water.
Cottonfluff Napping Bed
Super soft, super secure. Perfect for very young Animal Friends who need their naps!
Studded Seahorse Comb
This seahorse fossil is said to come all the way from Starfish Gap in Mermaid Lagoon!
Blaze Plush
This little Blaze toy is sparkly, snuggly and sweet!
Rockin' Firepit
This firepit is designed for safe indoor fires. It's the right size to heat Mallow and Kernel roasters.
Camp Cup
Camp isn't camp without a handy tinkered tin Camp Cup like this one.
Camp Tent
This tent is a must have for Fairies helping out during Camp Pixie Dust.
Mallow Roaster
This simple stand is perfect for roasting treats. This one comes with a marshmallow.
Kernel Roaster
This simple stand is perfect for roasting treats. This one comes with a yellow corn kernel.
Everything Table
This simple table is handy and can be used as anything from a tea caddy to a work bench.
Super Sundae
This Sundae is so yummy, and perfect for hot days at camp!
Turtle Plush
This little stuffed toy in the shape of a turtle has the softest shell!
Rabbit Plush
This little stuffed toy in the shape of a rabbit is one fluffy bunny!
Otter Plush
This little stuffed toy in the shape of an otter is so huggable!
Glowworm Plush
This little stuffed toy in the shape of a glowworm is bright and snuggly!
Butterfly Plush
This little stuffed toy in the shape of a butterfly is flitterific!
Fun Fungi Staircase
Bounce upstairs and downstairs at home with this Fun Fungi Staircase!
Moss Staircase
Make a grand entrance in your home with this elegant Moss Staircase.
Fallen Wood Stacked Floor
Fallen wood makes these gorgeous stacked floors.
Fallen Wood Flooring
Fallen wood makes up these gorgeous floor plaftorms.
Oyster Shell Flooring
Large oyster shells are an elegant way to create additional floors.
Mushroom Flooring
Large, flat mushrooms are a soft option for creating additional floors.
Tall Grass Flooring
Strong blades of grass can make handy flooring for dividing tall spaces.
Leaf Screen Wall
This gorgeous screen is both décor and a side wall for dividing spaces.
Leaf Screen Back
This gorgeous screen is both décor and a handy back wall.
Longer Ladder
This piece is handy by itself, or use more than one to create longer ladders.
Comb Climber
This comb makes a wonderful ladder for climbing between floors.
Bobby Ladder
This lost things ladder is constructed from Bobby Pins!
Sweet Bee Wall
This side wall of honeycomb is handy for creating room spaces at home.
Sweet Bee Cubby
This back wall of honeycomb is handy -- fill its cubbyholes with all your stuff!
Great Gears Dinette
Great gears -- it's a table! Pull up some Great Gears Chairs for a complete look.
Great Gears Shelves
This clunky cog shelf is great for displaying anything.
Great Gears Sofa
This clunky, but funky tinkered sofa is not just stylish - it's comfortable!
Great Gears Side Table
This cute and funky little tinkered table looks great with the Great Gears Sofa.
Great Gears Chair
An inventive chair that adds a tinker-made feel to any room.
Farmhouse Hutch
Spruce up any room with this lovely Farmhouse Hutch.
Farmhouse Table
This lovely large dining table was inspired by one seen in a farmhouse on the mainland.
Farmhouse Side Chair
This sturdy chair was inspired by those seen in farmhouses on the mainland.
Hay There!
Hay there! This bale of hay makes a great stool or table.
Pumpkin Picnic Table
For a formal dinner or picnic, this Pumpkin Table is perfect for dining with friends!
Cedar Chair
These wonderfully simple chairs are a great way to re-use fallen cedar!
Maple Drapes
Spice up your windows with these sweet as syrup Maple Drapes.
Teacher's Desk
This large desk is inspired by teacher's desks seen on the mainland.
Student's Desk
This cute little desk is inspired by those found in classrooms on the mainland.
Student's Chair
This chair is inspired by student's chairs seen on the mainland.
Classroom Chalkboard
This cute little chalkboard can be used for Fairy lessons at home!
Lizzy's Stamp
Decorate your own home as Lizzy did with this cute stamp wall décor.
Lizzy's Peppermint
Freshen the look and smell of your home with these peppermints from Lizzy!
Lizzy's Lace Curtains
These curtains are inspired by the lace doily Lizzy used in her Fairy home.
Lizzy's Pocketwatch
This pocketwatch is just like the one Lizzy put in her Fairy home.
Lizzy's Button
These extra buttons from Lizzy make wonderful decorations for any home!
Lizzy's Artwork
Hang this beautiful picture drawn by Lizzy in your home.
Pad and Pencil
This little pad and pencil is a must have for the organized Fairy!
Dragonfly Pendant
This delicate Dragonfly Pendant light casts a warm, soft glow around any room.
Sour Plum Tree Plant
This little planter with a sour plum tree is inspired by Vidia's home.
Vidia Spinner
This little mobile is just like those near Vidia's Sour Plum Tree!
Teacher's Chair
This cute little chair is inspired by those found in classrooms on the mainland.
Found Flashlight
This giant mainland tinkered beauty is big, but bright!
Tray of Cookies
Are your guests hungry? Put this tray of fresh baked cookies out!
Big Mixing Bowl
Every cook needs a Big Mixing Bowl for baking!
Dandelion Bed
This cozy dandelion bed makes your Animal Friend feel right at home!
Bee Bed
This cozy honeycomb bed makes your Animal Friend feel right at home!
Fallen Wood Stacked Loft
Fallen wood makes these gorgeous stacked lofts.
Hot Hot Stove
This stove is hot, better place it far from your ice furniture.
Icy Chandelier
Brrrr! This chandelier is not just beautiful, it's as cool as ice!
Lovely Snowflake Ornament
Decorate for the winter season with a few of these Lovely Snowflake Ornaments.
Ribbon Streamers
Decorate for a party or even just for fun with a few simple streamers.
Tulip Balloons
A big bunch of small tulips make a great bouquet of balloons.
Ribbon and Twig Present
This ribbon and twig-wrapped present makes any house feel festive.
Tulip Balloons
A big bunch of small tulips make a great bouquet of balloons.
Snowman Snowglobe
This cute little snowman in a snowglobe is a great winter decoration.
Ribbon-Wrapped Present
This ribbon-wrapped present makes any house feel festive.
Leaf-Wrapped Present
This leaf-wrapped present makes any house feel festive.
Metal Soup Pot and Ladle
This sturdy tinkered soup pot and ladle set will last forever!
Dainty Snowflake Ornament
Decorate for the winter season with a few of these Dainty Snowflake Ornaments.
Chilly Shelves
Keep your home items in cold storage with this Chilly Shelf!
Snow Fox Snow Sculpture
This snow sculpture of a beautiful snow fox is a gorgeous addition to any home.
Deer Ice Sculpture
This ice sculpture of a graceful deer is an elegant addition to any home.
Bear Ice Sculpture
This ice sculpture of a winter bear is a bold addition to any home.
Chilly Table
There is nothing cooler than a Chilly Table!
Chilly Couch
Chill out on this comfy frozen couch.
Chilly Chair
Have a seat on this ice cold Chilly Chair.
Bunny Snow Sculpture
This snow sculpture of a cute bunny is an adorable addition to any home.
Ladybug Sculpture
This gourd sculpture of a ladybug is a lovely home decoration.
Hummingbird Sculpture
This gourd sculpture of a hummingbird is a lovely home decoration.
Firefly Sculpture
This gourd sculpture of a firefly is a lovely home decoration.
Dragonfly Sculpture
This gourd sculpture of a dragonfly is a lovely home decoration.
Bee Sculpture
This gourd sculpture of a bee is a lovely home decoration.
Winter Wonderland Lanterns
This lovely string of seasonal lanterns looks great in any home.
Grand Metal Staircase
Your guests will all make a grand entrance on this fabulous staircase of tinkered metal.
Spiral Shell Stairs
Lovely lagoon shell stairs connect floors while bringing a bit of the beach to your home!
River Rock
A plain old River Rock from Havendish Stream.
Conch Shell Couch
Not the softest, but it's sturdy and sitting on it you can hear the ocean!
Sit Sweetly Chair
There is nothing sweeter than sitting on this candy chair!
Sit Sweetly Sofa
There is nothing sweeter than sitting on this candy sofa!
Sit Sweetly Table
There is nothing sweeter than sitting at this candy table!
Floating Dragonfly
Honor the dragonfly with this unique hanging sculpture.
Feather Curtains
Add some fast-flying flair to the windows and doors in your Fairy home!
Feather Rug
Cozy up your home with lots of soft feather rugs.
Orchid Swing
An elegant place to sit down and relax!
Cupcake Tower
This towering display of delicious cupcakes looks good enough to eat!
Deluxe Egg Basket
Put all of your Never Dove eggs in this big basket!
Rose Recliner
Rest easy in this soft and sweet smelling Rose Recliner.
